creator: michael.maier@vivai.de
text:
By setting strokeSVGText to false in the user configuration file to let all text is drawn into 
PDF using the PDF text commands no embedded font is used because the 
PDFTextPainter cannot find any font in its FontInfo-Object. 

The reason is a bug in the method "paint" of PDFTextPainter. The method tries to find the 
font defined by name, style and weight:
...
                if (fi.hasFont(name, weight, style )) {
...
but the correct call of the method hasFont is 
...
                if (fi.hasFont(name, style, weight)) {
...
because second parameter is the "style" and the third parameter is "weight".
After exchanging the style and weight parameter, the embbeded font is found.
Committed to the maintenance branch. (Was already fixed in HEAD)
creator: j3322ptm@yahoo.de

text: *** Bug 12564 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
